idea-plugin.name: MybatisFlex-helpler
idea-plugin.description: A tool that can quickly generate code according to the database table, the mapper layer uses mybagtis-flex, a highly customized, open code template, humanized configuration, and supports the local code template to share with the members of the project team, thereby providing the development efficiency of the project team mybatisFlex code generation is based on the official code generation template, by modifying the template to support mybatisFlex code generation. What is mybatisFlex? MyBatis-Flex is an elegant MyBatis enhancement framework that is very lightweight, with high performance and flexibility. We can easily link any database with Mybaits-Flex, and its built-in QueryWrapper^ highlights help us greatly reduce the work of SQL writing while reducing the possibility of errors. All in all, MyBatis Flex was able to greatly improve our development efficiency and development experience, giving us more time to focus on our own things
